mutants.original_line: name_score = sum((scores.get(a, 0) for a in name.upper()))
mutants.mutated_line: name_score = sum((scores.get(a, 1) for a in name.upper()))

mutants.original_line: name_score = sum((scores.get(a, 0) for a in name.upper()))
mutants.mutated_line: name_score = sum((scores.get(a, -1) for a in name.upper()))

mutants.original_line: name_score = sum((scores.get(a, 0) for a in name.upper()))
mutants.mutated_line: name_score = sum((scores.get(a, 1) for a in name.upper()))
